sentences.en: " Because I don't care to contribute to the support of Ashley Wilkes. "
sentences.cn: " 因为我不想资助艾希礼- 威尔克斯.

sentences.en: Bonds between adjacent atoms contribute more significantly than bonds between nonadjacent atoms.
sentences.cn: 相邻原子间的键比不相邻原子间的贡献大.

sentences.en: City employees cannot contribute to political campaigns.
sentences.cn: 市政府雇员不得捐助政治宣传活动。

sentences.en: Colloids contribute to the character of the soil in other ways.
sentences.cn: 胶质体对土壤的其它性状也有影响.

sentences.en: Each will contribute 20 yuan.
sentences.cn: 每人摊20元钱.

sentences.en: Enya’s success has contributed substantially to the current interest in Celtic music.
sentences.cn: 时下人们对凯尔特音乐感兴趣，这很大程度上要归功于恩雅的成功。

sentences.en: Heat, cold, tactile and other sensations contribute to flavour.
sentences.cn: 热、冷、触觉和其他感觉构成了食物风味的一部分。

sentences.en: How much did you contribute to the relief fund?
sentences.cn: 你为那笔救济金捐了 多少 ?

sentences.en: I am sure that this meeting will contribute to the reinforcement of peace and security all over the world.
sentences.cn: 我相信这次会议将会促进世界范围内的和平与安全。

sentences.en: Key burbled about the wonderful people who contribute to tourism.
sentences.cn: 基喋喋不休地谈论着那些对旅游业作出贡献的了不起的人物。

sentences.en: Local businesses have agreed to contribute.
sentences.cn: 当地的公司已经同意捐助了。

sentences.en: She contributed a number of articles to the magazine.
sentences.cn: 她给这家杂志撰写了一些稿件。

sentences.en: Stress is a contributing factor in many illnesses.
sentences.cn: 压力是许多疾病的致病因素。

sentences.en: The dotted lines indicate which AO's contribute significantly to each MO.
sentences.cn: 虚线表示出哪些AO对各MO有重要贡献.

sentences.en: The lower strings contribute a splendid richness of sonority.
sentences.cn: 下弦能够产生雄壮浑厚的音响效果。

sentences.en: The rich will be asked to contribute money; the strong to contribute labour.
sentences.cn: 有钱出钱, 有力出力.

sentences.en: The three sons also contribute to the family business.
sentences.cn: 这3个儿子也为家族事业做出了贡献。

sentences.en: The U.S. is contributing $4 billion in loans, credits, and grants.
sentences.cn: 美国以信贷和赠与的方式捐助了40亿美元。

sentences.en: They do not want cotton - woolling, they want a chance to contribute.
sentences.cn: 他们不愿受人百般呵护, 只想有机会做出贡献.

sentences.en: This led to an overestimation of what conceptual thinking could contribute to practical life.
sentences.cn: 这导致人们高估了概念式思考对实际生活的影响.

sentences.en: You need not feel obliged to contribute.
sentences.cn: 你不必觉得非捐款不可。

words.tran_cn: 出资的；贡献的；有助于；助长...的
捐助的；贡献的；有助于…的
贡献，出力；[图情]投稿；[经]捐献

trans.tran_cn: 捐献，增加，增进，做贡献，促成，撰稿，讲话，是…的原因
trans.tran_en: to give money, help, ideas etc to something that a lot of other people are also involved in

trans.tran_cn: 捐献，作出贡献；有助于，促成；起作用；投稿
trans.tran_en: to give money, help, ideas etc to something that a lot of other people are also involved in

trans.tran_cn: 捐， 捐献， 捐款； 投； 贡献
trans.tran_en: to give money, help, ideas etc to something that a lot of other people are also involved in
